titles.title: Celebrating the 130th anniversary of the birth of Bhimrao Ramji Ambedkar.
Celebrating the 130th anniversary of the birth of Bhimrao Ramji Ambedkar.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

term.name: Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status

bill.summary: This resolution celebrates the life and accomplishments of Bhimrao Ramji Ambedkar, an Indian politician and jurist who campaigned against social discrimination and drafted the Constitution of India. The resolution also recognizes equality, justice, and liberty as essential rights.
